name: XX99 MARK II Headphones
description: Experience natural, lifelike audio and exceptional build quality made for the passionate music enthusiast.

name: A5+ HOME MUSIC SYSTEM
description: The A5+ premium powered speakers are a complete home music system with bold stereo sound that fills any room. Wired or wireless connections including aptX-HD Bluetooth from your phone, tablet or computer, or good old analog from that vintage turntable or 80's Sony tape deck.

name: Lenovo HT05 TWS Earphones
description: Precise and accurate sound with excellent sound experience is all you need! The Lenovo HT05 TWS earphones can provide you that. Multi-functional touch control that supports switch songs, phone call, and volume control is just one of the advantages of these earphones.
